com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator

Class PropagatorFunctionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.AdapterImpl
      • com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator.AbstractAdapter
        • com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator.PropagatorAbstractAdapter
          • com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator.PropagatorFunctionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter.Internal

    public abstract class PropagatorFunctionAdapter
extends PropagatorAbstractAdapter

    Manage the refresh of derived data elements by listening to changes, remembering when out of date, and declaring data elements this data element depends on.

    A PropagatorFunctionAdapter:

    • implements some refresh logic: method calculate()
    • maintains its touched state
      • whether this propagator is up to date or not (up to date = untouched, needs refresh = touched): isTouched()
      • a collection of touched children of this propagatortouchedFunctionAdapters
    • offers a method, insuring that this Propagator become up to date: refresh(); this entails
      • refreshing all antecedents ancestors: the parent, the parent's parent, ..., recursively
      • refreshing all antecedents siblings, antecedent's antecedents sibling, ... recursively
      • refreshing all children
      • refreshing this Propagator (method calculate())
    • listens to change notifications
      • of this PropagatorFunctionAdapter's notifier by overriding see PropagatorAbstractAdapter.notifyChanged(Notification)
      • of other Notifiers, by delegating to some extension of PropagatorDependencyAdapter
    • declares
      • a Parent PropagatorFunctionAdapter: method getParent()
      • a collection of siblings PropagatorFunctionAdapter it depends on getAntecedents()
      satisfying
      • first the antecedents siblings will be refreshed
      • second the children will be refreshed
      • finally this propagator will be refreshed

    The PropagatorFunctionAdapter life cycle is as follows It is created by ObjectWithPropagatorFunctionAdapter.addPropagatorFunctionAdapter(). The method addPropagatorFunctionAdapters is called by the PropagatorFunctionAdapterManager when the object is contained. The propagator is removed, when the object is no longer contained (if not touched) or by the method calculate (if it is touched)

    Author:
    michel

        private boolean refreshThis()
        Calculate this PropagatorFunctionAdapter Assume that all Parent antecedents are calculated, and that all children are calculated
        Returns:

      • refreshChildrenAndThis

        boolean refreshChildrenAndThis()
        Refresh the PropagatorFunctionAdapter, so as is becomes untouched. Assume that all the parent's antecedents are refreshed. Propagate all the touched children and their antecedents. Calculate the PropagatorFunctionAdapter.
        Returns:
        false when an error occurred, propagator not refreshed

      • refreshAntecedents

        private boolean refreshAntecedents()
        Refresh the Antecedents Do not assume that all the parent's antecedents are refreshed, but refresh them
        Returns:
        false when an error occurred, propagator not refreshed

      • refresh

        public boolean refresh()
        Refresh the PropagatorFunctionAdapter, so as is becomes untouched. Make no assumption on the antecedents states or parent states Propagate minimally so that this PropagatorFunctionAdapter becomes up to date
        Returns:
        false when an error occurred, propagator not refreshed

      • depthFirstSearch

        private static boolean depthFirstSearch(PropagatorFunctionAdapter.DepthFirstSearchContext context,
                       PropagatorFunctionAdapter functionAdapter)
        Visit functionAdapter antecedents, the antecedents of this latter, and so on recursively. Insure all of them are refreshed. Then refresh functionAdapter
        Returns:
        false when an error occurred, propagator not refreshed

      • depthFirstSearch

        public static boolean depthFirstSearch(PropagatorFunctionAdapter functionAdapter)
        Start a depth first traversal of the antecedents and refresh every node visited, with as initial node functionAdapter
        Returns:
        false when an error occurred, propagator not refreshed
